text:
I have an idea,
When the page loads with bust cache it appends all the links on the page with the current bust cache query
I had an issue with the js when a hash is on the url and had to manually add the query to my links so the page wouldnâ€™t reload without the bust cache

I hope that makes some kind of sense!

<@UDJV5B73R> interesting idea. Can you elaborate a little more on the problem you're encountering? Is it that links to sections within the same page are causing you to go back to the normal url without the cachebuster?
